articles.title: Simvastatin Found to Be Effective for Vitiligo Patients with Dyslipidemia - MD Magazine
articles.description: New research suggests the use of simvastatin treatment may be helpful for patients with nonsegmental vitiligo and dyslipidemia.
articles.content:
